TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextReturnReader extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeReturnReader

summary.span: 針對使用 HTTP 但不使用 SOAP 實作的 Web 服務用戶端，從 HTTP 回應文字讀取傳回值。

span.span: Reads return values from HTTP response text for Web service clients implemented using HTTP but without SOAP.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別和其他類別命名空間支援.NET Framework 實作 Web 服務透過 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 作業。 and other classes in the namespace support the .NET Framework's implementations of Web services via the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations. Web 服務寫入器和讀取序列化和還原序列化，分別參數或 Web 方法的傳回物件之間的 HTTP 要求或回應資料流。Web service writers and readers serialize and deserialize, respectively, between the parameters or return objects of Web methods and the HTTP request or response streams. Web 服務寫入器和讀取器使用 HTTP 傳輸，但不會交換使用 SOAP 標準的訊息。Web service writers and readers use HTTP for transport but don't exchange messages using the SOAP standard. 類別會實作非 XML 文字的用戶端讀取資料到 Web 方法的傳回值。The class implements the client-side reading of non-XML text into Web method return values. 若要取得傳回值，編碼的 HTTP 回應主體中，文字會剖析使用規則運算式模式比對屬性所指定，可以套用至用戶端 proxy 類別中的 Web 方法。To obtain a return value, the text, which is encoded in the body of an HTTP response, is parsed using regular expression pattern matching, as specified by the attribute , which can be applied to a Web method in a client proxy class. 類別會呼叫類別實際執行模式比對。The class calls the class to actually perform the pattern matching. 文字模式比對可讓 Web 服務擷取的 HTML 內容，而不會轉換成必須繫結至 XML 結構描述定義的 XML 文件。Text pattern matching provides a way for Web services to retrieve HTML content without converting it to XML documents that must be bound to XML Schema definitions. 透過 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 文件中指定的規則運算式搜尋目標`match`內 XML 項目`text`項目。Regular expression search targets are specified in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document via `match` XML elements within `text` elements. 這兩個項目屬於命名空間http://microsoft.com/wsdl/mime/textMatching/。Both elements belong to the namespace http://microsoft.com/wsdl/mime/textMatching/. 當**符合**元素來指定 WSDL 文件中的 Wsdl.exe 工具適用於屬性，將會產生用戶端 proxy 類別中的對應 Web 方法。When **match** elements are specified in a WSDL document, the Wsdl.exe tool applies attributes to the corresponding Web methods in the client proxy class that is generated. 此外，用來取代，進行還原序列化的 Web 方法的預設類別透過 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 作業傳回的 Web 服務的.NET Framework 實作根據的值。Also, is used in place of , the default class for deserializing Web method return values according to the .NET Framework's implementations of Web services via the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations. 您通常會不需要使用直接類別。You typically will not need to use the class directly.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object GetInitializer(class System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo methodInfo) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetInitializer (methodInfo As LogicalMethodInfo) As Object

param.name: methodInfo
param.span: ，可指定要取得初始設定式的 Web 方法。

span.span: A that specifies the Web method for which the initializer is obtained.

summary.span: 傳回指定方法的初始設定式。

span.span: Returns an initializer for the specified method.

returns.span: 指定方法的初始設定式。

span.span: An initializer for the specified method

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始設定式會當做參數傳遞的物件方法。An initializer is an object passed as a parameter to the method. 如類別初始設定式是物件根據 Web 方法的傳回型別。For the class, the initializer is a object based on the return type of the Web method. 服務初始化期間叫用方法。The method is invoked during service initialization. 稍後，在處理回應的時間，在初始設定式物件會傳遞至另一個方法執行個體。Later, at the time a response is processed, the initializer object is passed to the method of another instance. 另一個執行個體執行實際的讀取。The other instance performs the actual reading.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(object o) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (o As Object)

param.name: o
param.span: 物件，用於正在叫用之 Web 方法的傳回型別。

span.span: A object for the return type of the Web method being invoked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供所使用物件方法來剖析 HTTP 回應中包含的文字。The method supplies the object used by the method to parse text contained in the HTTP response. 處理要求時叫用方法。The method is invoked at the time a request is processed. 輸入的參數、 `o`，透過呼叫另一個執行個體在用戶端初始化期間取得類別的方法。The input parameter, `o`, is obtained by calling the method on another instance of the class that is obtained during client initialization.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object Read (System.Net.WebResponse response, System.IO.Stream responseStream);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object Read(class System.Net.WebResponse response, class System.IO.Stream responseStream) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Read (response As WebResponse, responseStream As Stream) As Object
public: override System::Object ^ Read(System::Net::WebResponse ^ response, System::IO::Stream ^ responseStream);

param.name: response
param.span: 物件，包含作業的輸出訊息。

span.span: A object containing the output message for an operation.

param.name: responseStream
param.span: ，其內容為 response 參數代表的 HTTP 回應主體。

span.span: A whose content is the body of the HTTP response represented by the response parameter.

summary.span: 剖析 HTTP 回應中包含的文字。

span.span: Parses text contained in the HTTP response.

returns.span: 物件，包含已還原序列化的 Web 方法傳回值。

span.span: An object containing the deserialized Web method return value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要剖析文字內容的 HTTP 回應，類別的實作方法會使用物件做為引數傳遞方法。To parse the text content of the HTTP response, the class's implementation of the method uses the object passed as an argument to the method. 它會傳回已還原序列化的 Web 方法傳回值之前關閉回應資料流。It closes the response stream before returning the deserialized Web method return value.
